name: Bostik Kabaddi
description:
Bostik Kabaddi is a small party game.

You've got to knock your opponent off the stage.

Basic moves include rotating your arm to punch your opponent, jumping forward, kicking and throwing a ball.

Right now you can play with the keyboard as there's no support for gamepads.

Player 1
A - Hold to rotate your arm. When you have the ball remember to hold until you gain momentum and release to throw it.
S - Jump forward. Press it again while in the air to kick your opponent

Player 2
K - Hold to rotate your arm. When you have the ball remember to hold until you gain momentum and release to throw it.
L - Jump forward. Press it again while in the air to kick your opponent

Code: Valerio Santinelli
Graphics: Valerio Santinelli and assets from White City on the Unity Asset Store by ALIyerEdon
Music: Valerio Santinelli
Sound effects: freesound.org
